title: The Marriage Crisis: The Failing Intergenerational Handoff. Episode 1
description:
For a long time I've been wanting to begin this conversation but waiting for the right people to begin with. Kathryn is a therapist in Canada. James has a PhD in Psychology and teaches in Sacramento and is a member of our local meetup. Joey is a single man in his 30s and helped start the Bridges of Meaning Discord server. Cassidy is a member of this community and active on the Discord server. This is our first crack at making progress in this conversation. 

Due to a bot-attack we're reworking how to let new people into the Discord

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
